content:
In the original script that you provided, it is not specified who the boss is. There are several characters mentioned in the script, including the expert, Walter (the Project Manager), Anderson (the expert in all matters related to drawing red lines), Justine (the company's design specialist), and the person who set the task (presumably a superior or boss to the other characters).

Without more information, it is difficult to determine who the boss is in the sketch. It is possible that the person who set the task is the boss, or that there is another character who is the boss and is not mentioned in the script.
